Message:
As I got bigger,
I learned more and more
skills that an aspiring Viking
would need to know.

Like how to row a boat,
and how to use a handaxe.

Then that fateful day came—
the day the Curse fell
from the sky.

The world I’d known
all my life—
the beautiful lakes,
the green mountains...
Everything was crushed
by crystals.

Everything I loved
was lost in an instant...
But, I didn’t cry.
